channel.title: Need working ::pickup
channel.description: Ever since I followed Mr. Quarter's tutorial, I cannot get ::pickup to work. Anybody add new cached items and HAVE a working ::pickup command?

item.title: Need working ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

[quote=“Aurai, post:15, topic:179162”]Uhhh… I think you can use the dropItem method…
Hold on let me program it for you, may not work though.

if (command.startsWith("item") && playerRights >= 2)) {
 try {
   int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,10));
   int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11));
   dropItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
 }
 catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::item 00995 10");
 }
}

That one should work with 5-integer items (but ONLY that!)

GOOGLE IT NOOB! OMG…

karma eh?

You don’t have to be such an ass…[/quote]

That was sacasim…and I helped him eh?

Read full topic

item.title: Need working ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

You didn’t say that in your post. nd I’ll give you mine one sec.

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("tyler") || playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,13)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(14)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

you can change the 20000 to 30000 if you don’t ever wanna change it agian.

Read full topic

item.title: Need working ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

5 integer, oh let me write you one

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)) {
 try {
   int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
   int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
   addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
 }
 catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 00995 10");
 }
}

Note: that will ONLY work with 5 integer’d items.

Read full topic

item.title: Need working ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

do u do like this ::pickup 3747 10
??
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2008, 07:56:21 PM[/size][hr]else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pimp”) || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2008, 07:56:50 PM[/size][hr]that should be it
